about_the_game:
Create, customize, and manage a vibrant sex club filled with adorable anthropomorphic characters. Watch the party unfold, while you install adult devices, navigate finances, protect your reputation, and manage a team of dedicated employees.

Build and decorate your club

Design your dream club from the ground up! Construct multiple floors of furry fun, with a vast selection of furniture and decorations of various themes. Let your imagination run wild as you paint your building, create unique spaces, and curate an unforgettable atmosphere.

Install sex furnitures for your clients

Furnish and flourish! Fill the place with adult furnitures, enticing guests to revel in unforgettable experiences. Watch as they immerse themselves in your mesmerizing design, paying homage to your club while creating magical moments.

Recruit, manage, level-up employees

Empower your employees to keep the party roaring! From cleaning and repairing furniture to operating selected pieces, they ensure a seamless club experience. Level them up, assign tasks, and witness their dedication in action.

Features

  • Create your club and install sex furnitures
  • Procedurally generated furries clients
  • Change the colours and decorate the place
  • Recruit, organize and level-up employees
  • Original soundtrack
  • Unlock more building and furnitures to build
  • Unlock more storey and terrain to expand further

content_descriptors.notes: Contains 3D nudity, sex animations and explicit voice acting.

name: Risky Sanctuary

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Create, customize, and manage a vibrant sex club filled with adorable anthropomorphic characters. Watch the party unfold, while you install adult devices, navigate finances, protect your reputation, and manage a team of dedicated employees.
supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support
